title: how to press a key of the keyboard from qt pushbutton
body:
My project is to read a dicom series and make some function on these series

I have 5 pushbuttons on my project, in the window i need sometimes to press ctrl for example to do some operations on my image ensured by vtk like zoom and rotate ... My purpose is when i press zoom then i press with the mouse on the image, the image will be zoomed, to do zoom with vtk you can press ctrl+the left mouse, then my idea is to make ctrl active when i press zoom, then automatically the image will be zoomed when i click on the left mouse.

I want if I click on the zoom button, the ctrl button must be activate until I quit the window !!!!!!!!
